sn25.10:4.2: “Mendicants, form is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25.10:4.6: and consciousness are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25.10:4.7: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at certainty regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25.10:4.8: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
sn25.10:4.9: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25.10:5.1: Someone who accepts these principles after considering them with a degree of wisdom is called
sn25.10:5.2: a follower of principles. They’ve arrived at certainty regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25.10:5.3: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
sn25.10:5.4: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25.10:5.5: Someone who understands and sees these principles is called
sn25.10:5.6: a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”
sn25.10:9.1: The Linked Discourses on arrival are complete.
